name: cv30.server
description: CV30 GraphQL server running on Express and Apollo Server

scripts.setup_ecs_exec_role: set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && aws iam --region eu-west-1 create-role --role-name ecsTaskExecutionRole --assume-role-policy-document file://aws/task-execution-assume-role.json && aws iam --region eu-west-1 attach-role-policy --role-name ecsTaskExecutionRole --policy-arn arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AmazonECSTaskExecutionRolePolicy
scripts.setup_ecs_cluster: set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && ecs-cli configure --cluster CV30-Production --region eu-west-1 --default-launch-type FARGATE --config-name CV30-Production && ecs-cli up
scripts.setup_ecs_sg: set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && aws ec2 create-security-group --group-name "cv30-ecs-production-sg" --description "CV30 Production security group" --vpc-id
scripts.allow_inbound: set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && aws ec2 authorize-security-group-ingress --group-id  --protocol tcp --port 80 --cidr 0.0.0.0/0
scripts.create-ecr-repo: set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && aws ecr create-repository --repository-name cv30-production

author: Wowzaaa DevTeam
